005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ICollectionValue;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.FunctionUtils;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IArgument;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunction;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IAnyAtomicItem;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.function.IMapItem;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
019
020import java.util.List;
021
022import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
023
024/**
025 * Implements the XPath 3.1 <a href=
026 * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-map-entry">map:entry</a>
027 * function.
028 */
029public final class MapEntry {
030  private static final String NAME = "entry";
031  @NonNull
032  public static final IFunction SIGNATURE = IFunction.builder()
033      .name(NAME)
034      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS_MAP)
035      .deterministic()
036      .contextIndependent()
037      .focusIndependent()
038      .argument(IArgument.builder()
039          .name("key")
040          .type(IAnyAtomicItem.class)
041          .one()
042          .build())
043      .argument(IArgument.builder()
044          .name("item")
045          .type(IItem.class)
046          .zeroOrMore()
047          .build())
048      .returnType(IItem.class)
049      .returnOne()
050      .functionHandler(MapEntry::execute)
051      .build();
052
053  private MapEntry() {
054    // disable construction
055  }
056
057  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
058  @NonNull
059  private static <T extends ICollectionValue> ISequence<IMapItem<T>> execute(@NonNull IFunction function,
060      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
061      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
062      IItem focus) {
063    IAnyAtomicItem key = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(0).getFirstItem(true)));
064    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
065    T value = (T) arguments.get(1).toCollectionValue();
066
067    return entry(key, value).asSequence();
068  }
069
070  /**
071   * An implementation of XPath 3.1 <a href=
072   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-map-entry">map:entry</a>.
073   *
074   * @param <T>
075   *          the type of items in the given Metapath map
076   * @param key
077   *          the Metapath map entry key
078   * @param value
079   *          the Metapath map entry value
080   * @return a new array containing the modification
081   */
082  @NonNull
083  public static <T extends ICollectionValue> IMapItem<T> entry(
084      @NonNull IAnyAtomicItem key,
085      @NonNull T value) {
086    return IMapItem.ofEntries(IMapItem.entry(key, value));
087  }
088}
